elements.text: You are working on a very important team project. The project deadline is soon, and your colleagues still haven't completed their portion, and you wonder if you should complete their part. You reach out to them, conveying your concerns about the deadline and workload, and they begin working in a timely...

elements.name: Group Project Due_Work/Career Development_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
